Detailed Description

WebKitWebView signal handlers.

Function Documentation

static gboolean cream_module_webkit_button_press_event_cb ( WebKitWebView *  webview,
GdkEventButton *  event,
CreamModuleWebKit *  self 
) [static]
Parameters:
webviewA WebKitWebView object.
eventThe mouse event.
selfA CreamModuleWebKit object.
Returns:
TRUE if the signal was handled (will stop all other handlers).

This function handles the signal "button-press-event" which is emitted when the user click on the webview. If the click happened on an editable content, this handlers will set the browser's state to CREAM_MODE_INSERT, otherwise, it will set it to CREAM_MODE_NORMAL. This handler emit the signal "state-changed".

static void cream_module_webkit_notify_favicon_cb ( WebKitWebView *  webview,
GParamSpec *  pspec,
CreamModuleWebKit *  self 
) [static]
Parameters:
webviewA WebKitWebView object.
pspecGObject parameter specification.
selfA CreamModuleWebKit object.

This function handles the signal "notify::icon-uri" which is emitted when the favicon of the webview's page is loaded. This handlers emit the signal "favicon-changed".

CreamModuleWebKit *  self 
) [static]
Parameters:

pspecGObject parameter specification.
selfA CreamModuleWebKit object.

This function handles the signal "notify::progress" which is emitted when the webview is loading. This handlers emit the signal "progress-changed".

CreamModuleWebKit *  self 
) [static]
Parameters:
webviewA WebKitWebView object.
pspecGObject parameter specification.
selfA CreamModuleWebKit object.

This function handles the signal "notify::title" which is emitted when the webview's page got a new title. This handlers emit the signal "title-changed".

static void cream_module_webkit_notify_uri_cb ( WebKitWebView *  webview,
GParamSpec *  pspec,
CreamModuleWebKit *  self 
) [static]
Parameters:
webviewA WebKitWebView object.
pspecGObject parameter specification.
selfA CreamModuleWebKit object.

This function handles the signal "notify::uri" which is emitted when the webview loads a new URI. This handlers emit the signal "uri-changed".

static gboolean cream_module_webkit_signal_download_cb ( WebKitWebView *  webview,
WebKitDownload *  download,
CreamModuleWebKit *  self 
) [static]
Parameters:
webviewA WebKitWebView object.
downloadA WebKitDownload object.
selfA CreamModuleWebKit object.
Returns:
TRUE if the signal was handled (will stop all other handlers).

This function handles the signal "download-requested" which is emitted when the webview requests a download. This handlers emit the signal "download".
